H0.text: Who did the British fight at the Battle of Rorke's Drift in 1879. Xhosa

H1.text: Who did the British fight at the Battle of Rorke's Drift in 1879. Boers

H2.text: Who did the British fight at the Battle of Rorke's Drift in 1879. Basotho

H3.text: Who did the British fight at the Battle of Rorke's Drift in 1879. Zulus

A4.text: The successful British defence of the Swedish mission station of Rorke's Drift began once a large contingent of Zulu warriors broke off from the main force during the final hour of the British defeat at the day-long Battle of Isandlwana on 22 January 1879.

A5.text: Justacamouflaged 150 British and colonial troops defended the station against attacks by 3,000 to 4,000 Zulu warriors.
